name: Robotussle
description:
Winner of the Best Aesthetic Award - PxlJam2016

PVP 2-12 local player robot physics rag-doll tussle!

Use up to 5 controllers (shared) + keyboard in a crazy robot fighting game!

Impale others with your head-rod to leave them in bits! Attack with a raging rag-doll dive to send you opponents to the ro-bottom of the robot lava river. Break boxes and rubbish tins to let loose the crazy bananas.

Players can scale walls by spamming rag-doll to engage in mid-air robot conflict.

Controls:

Xbox: L Stick + L bumper, R Stick + R bumper.

Keboard: WASD + L Ctrl, Arrows + R Ctrl.

Note - This was completed in 48 hours. There are likely a lot of bugs, some of which are intentional!

Submitted for PxlJam2016 48 hour game jam Wellington, New Zealand.

Credits: Programmers - Isaac Blomfield. Digl Dixon, Kohl Bromwich. Audio - Duncan Phillips. Art - Zach, Level Design - Isaac Blomfield
